test.name: Destroy Vagrant VMs and check shutdown message

kw.name: Run Process
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
kw.msg: '==> csp2s22c03: You assigned a static IP ending in ".1" to this machine. ==> csp2s22c03: This is very often used by the router and can cause the ==> csp2s22c03: network to not work properly. If the network doesn't work ==> csp2s22c03: properly, try changing this IP. ==> csp2s22c03: You assigned a static IP ending in ".1" to this machine. ==> csp2s22c03: This is very often used by the router and can cause the ==> csp2s22c03: network to not work properly. If the network doesn't work ==> csp2s22c03: properly, try changing this IP. ==> csp2s22c03: Forcing shutdown of VM... ==> csp2s22c03: Destroying VM and associated drives... ==> csp2s22c04: Forcing shutdown of VM... ==> csp2s22c04: Destroying VM and associated drives... ==> net2s22c05: Forcing shutdown of VM... ==> net2s22c05: Destroying VM and associated drives...' does not contain 'Attempting graceful shutdown of VM'

test.status: '==> csp2s22c03: You assigned a static IP ending in ".1" to this machine. ==> csp2s22c03: This is very often used by the router and can cause the ==> csp2s22c03: network to not work properly. If the network doesn't work ==> csp2s22c03: properly, try changing this IP. ==> csp2s22c03: You assigned a static IP ending in ".1" to this machine. ==> csp2s22c03: This is very often used by the router and can cause the ==> csp2s22c03: network to not work properly. If the network doesn't work ==> csp2s22c03: properly, try changing this IP. ==> csp2s22c03: Forcing shutdown of VM... ==> csp2s22c03: Destroying VM and associated drives... ==> csp2s22c04: Forcing shutdown of VM... ==> csp2s22c04: Destroying VM and associated drives... ==> net2s22c05: Forcing shutdown of VM... ==> net2s22c05: Destroying VM and associated drives...' does not contain 'Attempting graceful shutdown of VM'
